org.sidif.util

Interface SiDIFReader

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    SiDIFLanguageParser, SiDIFTripleListVisitor

    public interface SiDIFReader
    generic interface to read a TripleStore from SiDIF
    Author:
    wf

    • Method Summary
